article.headline: Lululemon to buy work-out video maker Mirror for $500 mln
article.body: June 29 (Reuters) - Lululemon Athletica Inc said on Monday it would buy home fitness content maker Mirror for $500 million, as the high-end yogawear company looks to cash in on booming demand for at-home fitness classes spurred by coronavirus lockdowns.MIRROR launched in 2018 and offers weekly live classes, as well as on-demand workouts.(Reporting by Uday Sampath in Bengaluru; Editing by Aditya Soni)
